body: I really hate this kind of thing, dilf with ntr? Man i rather die than seeing it actually happens in front of my eyes. People who made these kind of doujin is the reason why i keep questioning about humanity

So I really hate NTR old dilf shit, but I want to know where this goes because I’m wanting to see a really fucked ending where the brother does something. But for you cucks/wanna cucks I can translate some of the more important parts. She tells him that’s she’s just sleeping with someone she truly loves. The dad tells him that there is nothing wrong with them having sex because they aren’t related by blood like the siblings, and how she wanted this/he never pressured her (which is just him lying since the first confirmed that she’s just been groomed) They have him take a video because they just got married that day, and the last thing she asks him is why he’s crying. Towards the end he accepts his fate of being a cameraman and realizes without that there would be no place for him there. Also the author confirms a 3rd chapter. I really dislike this because they made the guys dick smaller in this one, and I can handle him being a cuck, but the artist’s inconsistency? Fucking cringe.
